function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on occupant assessments and judgments for post-occupancy evaluation may lead to inaccurate or biased data regarding the indoor environment.","Impact":"Inaccurate data may result in ineffective mitigation strategies for contagious diseases in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implement objective measurement methods alongside occupant assessments to validate and cross-reference data.","Technologies":"Sensor technologies for objective environmental measurements.","People":"Facility managers, building owners, and professionals involved in building operations.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, professionals."},{"Description":"Privacy concerns among building occupants due to the continuous collection of personal physiological and psychometric data.","Impact":"Privacy concerns may lead to resistance or non-compliance with data collection, impacting the effectiveness of disease propagation mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy protocols, obtain informed consent, and anonymize collected data.","Technologies":"Data anonymization techniques, secure data storage systems.","People":"Building occupants, data scientists, facility managers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management."},{"Description":"Difficulty in effectively collecting and analyzing physiological and psychometric data, requiring coordination with data scientists and comprehensive data storage and analysis infrastructure.","Impact":"Ineffective collection and analysis may lead to the inability to identify and mitigate potential health risks related to contagious diseases in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Invest in data science expertise, establish robust data collection and analysis infrastructure, and ensure secure data storage.","Technologies":"Advanced data analysis software, secure data storage systems.","People":"Facility managers, data scientists, building owners.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners."}]}
